text:
I recently set up a tomcat4.0 with https support (J2sdk1.4b3) on 
my linux box. But, when I tried to access https://mysite:port/, 
it always returned the following error message :

"The security library has encountered an improper formated 
DER-encoded message".

But, when I try to access the URL from IE, it was always fine. 
In order to find out whether it's a netscape-specific problem,
I also set the same stuff up on my win2k. It turned out that I 
can access https via both IE and netscape. Could any one give me 
some help?

Jay
creator: jaywang1999@yahoo.com

text:
I don't see how Tomcat can introduce this kind of different behavior between
Windows and Linux. It may be a JDK problem (I've had lots of problems personally
with 1.4b3). It's highly unlikely that it comes from a Tomcat bug.
creator: remm@apache.org
